sentences.en: After the fire swallowed his cottage , the old man could not but feel utterly bereft.
sentences.cn: 在一场大火吞噬了他的草屋之后, 老人唯一的感觉就是他已经一无所有了.

sentences.en: Bereft of access to fresh capital, it is struggling even to buy parts from third parties.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏新资本的注入, Avtovaz甚至连从第三方购买配件都有困难.

sentences.en: Bereft of love, his mother almost drove him and herself mad.
sentences.cn: 失去了爱情的母亲差点把他和自己都逼疯了.

sentences.en: But, our failure to respond to His will simply leave us bereft of grace and guidance.
sentences.cn: 但是, 我们不按照他的意愿去做只会让我们失去他的恩惠和引领.

sentences.en: He is bereft of all hope.
He was knocked down to the ground, bereft of sense.
sentences.cn: 他被击倒在地, 失去了知觉.

sentences.en: That guy must have been bereft of his senses.
The bereft girl keened her sorrow.
sentences.cn: 那个失去亲人的姑娘哭出自己的悲痛之情.

sentences.en: The fire bereft them of their home.
sentences.cn: 那场火灾使他们丧失了他们的家.

sentences.en: The nasty knock on the head bereft him of consciousness.
sentences.cn: 那沉重的当头一击使他失去了知觉.

sentences.en: The place seemed to be utterly bereft of human life.
sentences.cn: 看起来，这地方人迹罕至。

sentences.en: The shot seemed a little empty and bereft of depth.
sentences.cn: 这个视角有一点空而且缺乏景深的感觉.

sentences.en: Then she looked at Fantine , who turned toward her her head bereft of its hair.
sentences.cn: 随后她看见芳汀把她的光头转过来向着她.

words.tran_cn: 使丧失（bereave的过去式和过去分词）
丧失的；被剥夺的；失去亲人的

trans.tran_cn: 被剥夺的，丧失的，失去亲人的
trans.tran_en: If a person or thing is bereft of something, they no longer have it
